sentences.sContent: As public right force puissant intervene, happened to be out of shape already.
sentences.sContent_eng: As public right force puissant intervene, happened to be out of shape already.
sentences.sCn: 随着公权力的强力介入， 已然发生了变形。

synos.tran: 强大的，强盛的；有势力的，有权力的

words.tran: 权力；权势；影响；（马的）越障能力测试
